PPLoc: HR data: Company Intranet and see link below; customer data: http://www.interactivedata.com/privacy-policy/
activities:
Human Resources Data: 

Interactive Data Corporation collects personal information from employees and job applicants for the purposes of recruitment, payroll administration, stock administration, visa/immigration processing, benefits enrollment, compensation planning, audit and compliance, career development, reporting, internal communications, and other activities needed to run the internal operations of our business.

Customer Data:
Interactive Data Corporation collects information from customers for the purposes of conducting business transactions that include: billing data, service delivery data such as names and titles of authorized users, email  and network addresses, postal addresses, telephone numbers, login credentials and related information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commission (FDPIC) for human resources data
